statements: SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, user_id, group_id, variation_id, conversion FROM ab_testing_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, experiment_date, group_id, variation_id, conversion, experiment_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT group_id, experiment_id, user_id, conversion, variation_id, experiment_date FROM ab_testing_data WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT variation_id, user_id, conversion, experiment_date, group_id, experiment_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE variation_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_date, user_id, group_id, conversion, variation_id, experiment_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE experiment_date = '2022-11-25';
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, group_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE group_id = 2 AND conversion = TRUE;
SELECT experiment_date, user_id, variation_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE user_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) AND variation_id > 3;
SELECT experiment_id, user_id, group_id FROM ab_testing_data WHERE variation_id BETWEEN 1 AND 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC, experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_data WHERE group_id = 1 AND conversion = FALSE AND experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT test_name, start_date FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_description, end_date FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE test_id = 5;
SELECT strategy_name, budget FROM Marketing_Strategies ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT strategy_description FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, start_date FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT AVG(budget) AS avg_budget, MAX(conversion_rate) AS max_conversion_rate FROM Marketing_Strategies;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE end_date > '2022-08-01' ORDER BY test_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE campaign_budget < 1000 ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT experiment_id, MAX(conversion_rate) FROM Experiment_Results GROUP BY experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM Experiment_Results WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE strategy_used = 'A/B Testing';
SELECT strategy_name, campaign_budget FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE campaign_budget > 1000 ORDER BY campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Experiment_Results WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.05 AND experiment_id IN (SELECT experiment_id FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE strategy_used = 'Variation A');

SELECT ER.result_id, ER.conversion_rate, ET.experiment_name, MS.strategy_name FROM Experiment_Results ER INNER JOIN A/B_Testing_Data ET ON ER.experiment_id = ET.experiment_id INNER JOIN Marketing_Strategies MS ON ER.strategy_id = MS.strategy_id ORDER BY ER.conversion_rate DESC, MS.strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data;
SELECT id, experiment_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE group_name = 'Control';
SELECT experiment_name, group_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT id, group_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, group_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE group_name = 'Variant' ORDER BY conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM A/B_Testing_Data ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, group_name, conversion_rate FROM A/B_Testing_Data WHERE group_name='control';
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget <= 10000;

SELECT er.experiment_id, er.conversion_rate, er.significance_level, el.timestamp FROM Experiment_Results er INNER JOIN A/B_Testing_Logs el ON er.experiment_id = el.experiment_id WHERE er.conversion_rate > 0.1 AND el.event_type='click';
SELECT * FROM experiment_data;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(result_id) AS total_results FROM experiment_results GROUP BY experiment_id;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT user_name, email, age, gender FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT experiment_id, campaign_id, user_id, conversion_rate FROM experiment_results ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_description, metric_value FROM comparison_metrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5;
